name: Pharmacy Depart Daily Revenue Report
query:
SELECT 
    I.item_code AS "Item Name:Data:300",
    SUM(CASE WHEN S.source_order = 'OPD' THEN I.net_rate * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "OPD Amount:Currency:110",
    SUM(CASE WHEN S.source_order = 'IPD' THEN I.net_rate * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "IPD Amount:Currency:110",
    SUM(CASE WHEN S.source_order = 'E.R' THEN I.net_rate * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "E.R Amount:Currency:110",
    SUM(CASE WHEN S.source_order IN ('OPD', 'IPD', 'E.R') THEN I.net_rate * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Total Amount:Currency:110"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I
ON 
    S.name = I.parent
WHERE  
    S.docstatus = 1
AND 
    S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
AND 
    I.item_group ="Pharmacy"
GROUP BY 
    I.item_code
